item.title: Grok is now free for all X users
item.description: The AI chatbot within X, Grok, is now free for all users - but with some limits. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Will people really pay $200 a month for OpenAI’s new chatbot?
item.description: On Thursday, OpenAI released what’s effectively a $200-a-month chatbot — and the AI community didn’t know quite what to make of it. The company’s new ...

item.title: If you can make this AI bot fall in love, you could win thousands of dollars
item.description: If you can be the first person to get an AI bot named Freysa to say ‘I love you,’ you’ll win anywhere from $3,000 to tens of thousands of dollars. © 2...

item.title: Snyk hits $300M ARR but isn’t rushing to go public
item.description: Several factors indicate that Snyk, most recently valued at $7.4 billion, could IPO soon. But the CEO told us why it might not. © 2024 TechCrunch. All...

item.title: Meta’s Nick Clegg says Elon Musk has potential to be a political ‘puppet master’
item.description: Meta’s Nick Clegg talked about how Musk is “playing an outsized role in both the election and now the formation of the new US administration.” © 2024 ...
